name: iot-connector
description: Universal IoT device discovery, protocol handlers (HTTP/WebSocket/MQTT), workflow automation, and safety rules engine for smart home, medical devices, and industrial IoT
author: Hermetic Labs

card.title: IoT Device Connector
card.description: Universal device discovery with MQTT, WebSocket, and safety rules

summary.overview: Universal IoT integration with MDNS/SSDP discovery, HTTP/WebSocket/MQTT protocol handlers, workflow automation, and a safety rules engine for smart home, medical, and industrial devices.
summary.exampleUseCase: Auto-discover smart devices on your network, pair them with templates for common manufacturers, set safety rules (never exceed X temperature), and trigger workflows based on sensor readings.
summary.whatMakesThisDifferent: Safety-first design with rate limiting and error recovery built-in. Medical device support with proper isolation. Template engine handles manufacturer quirks so you don't have to.
